account OF the author

robert burton son ralph burton ancient genteel famili
lindley leicestershir born th februari
He receiv first rudiment learn free school
sutton coldfield warwickshir whenc age
seventeen long vacat sent brazen nose colleg
condit common made consider progress logic
philosophi In elect student christ church
form sake put tuition dr john bancroft afterward

year georg lord berkeley kept use word

nobl patro franc countess dowag exet resign

democritu junior AD librum suum

vade liber quali non ausum dicer felix
Te nisi felicem fecerit alma die
vade tamen quocunqu lubet quascunqu per ora
Et genium domini fac imiter tui
blanda inter charit mystamqu saluta
musarum quemvi si tibi lector erit
rura cola urbem subeasv palatia regum
submiss placid te sine dent gera
nobili aut si qui te fort inspexerit hero
Da te morigerum perlegat usqu lubet
est quod nobilita est quod desideret hero
gratior haec forsan charta placer potest
Si qui morosu cato tetricusqu senat
hunc etiam librum fort vider velit
sive magistratu tum te reverent habeto
sed nullu musca non capiunt aquila
non vacat tempu fugitivum impender nugi
nec tale cupio par mihi lector erit
Si matrona gravi casu diverterit istuc
illustri domina aut te comitissa legat
est quod displiceat placeat quod forsitan illi
ingerer noli te modo pand tamen
At si virgo tua dignabitur inclyta charta
tanger sive schedi haereat illa tui
Da modo te facilem et quaedam folia ess memento
conveni oculi quae magi apta sui
Si generosa ancilla tuo aut alma puella
visura est ludo annu pand luben
dic utinam nunc ips meu nam diligit ista
In praesen esset conspiciendu heru
ignotu notusv mihi de gent togata
sive aget ludi pulpita sive colet
sive lycaeo et nuga evolverit ista
Si quasdam menda viderit inspicien
Da veniam authori dice nam plurima vellet
expungi quae jam displicuiss sciat
sive melancholicu quisquam seu blandu amat
aulicu aut civi seu bene comptu equ
huc appellat age et tuto te crede legenti
multa istic forsan non male nata leget
quod fugiat caveat quodqu amplexabitur ista
pagina fortassi promer multa potest
At si qui medicu coram te sistet amic
fac circumspect et te sine labe gera
inveniet namqu ips mei quoqu plurima scripti
non leve subsidium quae sibi forsan erunt
Si qui causidicu charta impingat ista
nil mihi vobiscum pessima turba vale
sit nisi vir bonu et juri sine fraud peritu
tum legat et forsan doctior ind siet
Si qui cordatu facili lectorqu benignu
huc oculo vertat quae velit ips legat
candidu ignoscet metua nil pand libent
offensu mendi non erit ill tui
laudabit nonnulla venit si rhetor ineptu
limata et tersa et qui bene cocta petit
claud citu librum nulla hic nisi ferrea verba
offend stomachum quae minu apta suum
At si qui non eximiu de plebe poeta
annu namqu istic plurima ficta leget
no sumu e numero nullu mihi spirat apollo
grandiloquu vate quilibet ess nequit
Si criticu lector tumidu censorqu molestu
zoilu et momu si rabiosa cohor
ring freme et noli tum pander turba maligni
Si occurrat sanni invidiosa sui
fac fugia si nulla tibi sit copia eundi
contemn tacit scommata quaequ fere
frendeat allatret vacua gannitibu aura
impleat haud cure placuiss nefa
verum age si forsan divertat purior hosp
cuiqu sale ludi displiceantqu joci
objiciatqu tibi sord lascivaqu dice
lasciva est domino et musa jocosa tuo
nec lasciva tamen si pensitet omn sed esto
sit lasciva licet pagina vita proba est
barbaru indoctusqu rudi spectat istam
Si messem intrudat fust fugabi eum
fungum pell procul jubeo nam quid mihi fungo
conveniunt stomacho non minu ista suo
sed nec pell tamen laeto omn accip vultu
quo qua vel qual ind vel und viro
gratu erit quicunqu venit gratissimu hosp
quisqui erit facili difficilisqu mihi
nam si culparit quaedam culpass juvabit
culpando faciet meliora sequi
sed si laudarit nequ laudibu efferar ulli
sit sati hisc mali opposuiss bonum
haec sunt quae nostro placuit mandar libello
Et quae dimitten dicer jussit heru


democritu junior TO hi book

paraphrast metric translat

Go forth book open day
happi made garish eye
oer earth wide surfac take thi vagrant way
To imit thi master geniu tri
the grace three muse nine salut
should love tri con thi lore
the countri citi seek grand throne boot
with gentl courtesi humbl bow
should nobl gallant soldier frank brave
seek thi acquaint hail first advanc
from twitch care thi pleasant vein may save
may laughter caus wisdom give perchanc
some surli cato senat auster
hapli may wish peep thi book
seem noth trembl rever
No forc eagl butterfli eer look
they love thee littl seek
and wish reader trifler like thyself
Of lude matron watch catch beck
Or gorgeou countess full pride pelf
they may say pish frown yet read
cri odd silli coars yet amus
should dainti damsel seek thi page con
spread thi best store neer refus
say fair one master love thee dear life
would gaze thi sweet look
should known unknown student freed strife
Of logic school explor book
cri merci critic thi book withhold
Be error pardon d though observ d
An humbl author implor make bold
thi kind indulg even undeserv d
should melancholi wight pensiv lover
courtier snug cit carpet knight trim
our blossom cull ll find clover
gain sens precept laughter whim
should learn leech solemn air unfold
thi leav bewar civil wise
thi volum mani precept sage may hold
hi well fraught head may find trifl prize
should crafti lawyer trespass ground
caitiff avaunt disturb tribe away
unless white crow honest one found
He ll better wiser go say
should ripe scholar gentl benign
with candour care judgment thee perus
thi fault kind oblivion ll consign
nor thi merit prais refus
thou mayst search polish d word vers
By flippant spouter emptiest prater
tell seek mawkish vers
My period rough nutmeg grater
the doggerel poet wish thee read
reject let glean thi jest stori
hi brother lowli sembl breed
apollo grant parnassian glori
menac d critic sour furrow brow
momu troilu scotch review
ruffl heckl grin growl vow
illnatur foe thu find fewer
when foulmouth d senseless railer cri thee
repli fli show rogu thi stern
they worthi even frown
good tast breed never learn
Or let clamour turn callou ear
As though dread harsh donkey bray
If chid censor friendli though sever
To explain turn thee away
thi vein say perchanc free
thi smutti languag suit learn pen
repli good sir throughout context see
thought chasten thought prithe judg
besid although master pen may wander
through deviou path ought stray
hi life pure beyond breath slander
So pardon grant t mere way
some rug ruffian make hideou rout
brandish thi cudgel threaten bast
the filthi fungu far thee cast
such noxiou banquet never suit tast
yet calm cautiou moder thi ire
Be ever courteou case allow
sweet malt ever made gentl fire
warm thi friend give civil bow
even censur sometim teach improv
slight frost often cure rank crop
So candid blame spleen shall never move
for skil gardner wayward branch lop
Go book bear word mind
guid safe pleasant ll find


the argument OF the frontispiec

ten distinct squar seen apart
are join one cutter art


old democritu tree
sit stone book knee
about hang mani featur
Of cat dog like creatur
Of make anatomi
the seat black choler see
over head appear sky
and saturn lord melancholi


To left landscap jealousi
present unto thine eye
A kingfish swan hern
two fightingcock may discern
two roar bull hie
To assault concern veneri
symbol say
conceiv rest afor


the next solitari
A portraitur doth well express
By sleep dog cat buck doe
hare coni desert go
bat owl shadi bower
In melancholi dark hover
mark well ift ast
blame bad cutter


ith column doth stand
inamorato fold hand
down hang head ters polit
some ditti sure doth indit
hi lute book lie
As symptom vaniti
If enough disclos
To paint take thyself th nose


hypocondriacus lean arm
wind side doth much harm
and troubl full sore god know
much pain hath mani woe
about pot glass lie
newli brought apothecari
thi saturn aspect signifi
you see portray d sky


beneath kneel knee
A superstiti man see
He fast pray idol fixt
torment hope fear betwixt
for hell perhap take pain
than thou dost heaven gain
ala poor soul piti thee
what star inclin thee


but see madman rage downright
with furiou look ghastli sight
nake chain bound doth lie
and roar amain know
observ glass
thine angri portraitur
hi pictur keep still thi presenc
twixt thee differ

IX
borage hellebor fill two scene
sovereign plant purg vein
Of melancholi cheer heart
Of black fume make smart
To clear brain misti fog
which dull sens soul clog
the best medicin eer god made
for maladi well assay d


now last fill place
present author face
and habit wear
hi imag world appear
hi mind art well express
that write may guess
It pride yet vainglori
though other commonli
made must know
the printer would need
then frown scoff
derid detract whit
for sure thou dost
He
then look upo nt behold see
As thou likst like thee
and stand view
thine command reader adieu


the author S abstract OF melancholi greek dialogo

when go muse alon
think diver thing foreknown
when build castl air
void sorrow void fear
pleas phantasm sweet
methink time run fleet
all joy folli
naught sweet melancholi
when lie wake alon
recount ill done
My thought tyrannis
fear sorrow surpris
whether tarri still go
methink time move slow
all grief jolli
naught mad melancholi
when act smile
with pleas thought time beguil
By brook side wood green
unheard unsought unseen
A thousand pleasur bless
and crown soul happi
all joy besid folli
none sweet melancholi
when lie sit walk alon
sigh griev make great moan
In dark grove irksom den
with discont furi
A thousand miseri
mine heavi heart soul ensconc
all grief jolli
none sour melancholi
methink hear methink see
sweet music wondrou melodi
town palac citi fine
here world mine
rare beauti gallant ladi shine
whate love divin
all joy folli
none sweet melancholi
methink hear methink see
ghost goblin fiend phantasi
present thousand ugli shape
headless bear black men ape
dole outcri fear sight
My sad dismal soul affright
all grief jolli
none damn d melancholi
methink court methink kiss
methink embrac mistress
O bless day O sweet content
In paradis time spent
such thought may still fanci move
So may ever love
all joy folli
naught sweet melancholi
when recount love mani fright
My sigh tear wake night
My jealou fit O mine hard fate
repent t late
No torment bad love
So bitter soul prove
all grief jolli
naught harsh melancholi
friend companion get gone
T desir alon
neer well thought
Do domin privaci
No gem treasur like
T delight crown bliss
all joy folli
naught sweet melancholi
T sole plagu alon
beast monster grown
light compani
find miseri
the scene turn d joy gone
fear discont sorrow come
all grief jolli
naught fierc melancholi
ll chang life king
ravisht world bring
more joy still laugh smile
In pleasant toy time beguil
Do O troubl
So sweet content feel see
all joy folli
none divin melancholi
ll chang state wretch
thou canst gaol dunghil fetch
My pain past cure anoth hell
may torment dwell
now desper hate life
lend halter knife
all grief jolli
naught damn d melancholi




democritu junior TO the reader

gentl reader presum thou wilt inquisit know antic
person actor insol intrud upon common
theatr world view arrog anoth man name whenc
doth hath say although said primum
si noluero non respondebo qui coacturu est free man born
may choos whether tell compel If urg
readili repli egyptian plutarch curiou fellow would
need know basket quum vide velatam quid inquiri
rem absconditam It therefor cover know
seek hid content pleas thee
thi use suppos man moon thou wilt
author would willingli known yet sort give
thee satisfact need show reason
usurp name titl subject and first name democritu
lest man reason deceiv expect pasquil
satir ridicul treatis done
prodigi tenet paradox earth motion infinit world in
infinito vacuo ex fortuita atomorum collisione infinit wast
caus accident collis mote sun democritu
held epicuru master lucippu old maintain late
reviv copernicu brunu other besid hath

slow direct per ambages deep shallow muddi
clear broad narrow doth style flow seriou

humani literi dictum sit id nec dictum esto In mean time
requir favour censur fault omit harsh composit
pleonasm word tautolog repetit though seneca bear
nunquam nimi dicitur quod nunquam sati dicitur perturb
tens number printer fault c My translat sometim rather
paraphras interpret non ad verbum author use
liberti taken purpos quotat
often insert text make style harsh
margin happen greek author plato plutarch athenaeu c
cite interpret origin

repetit author name rank per accidens accord
chronolog sometim neoter ancient memori suggest

amend much ad mani good author kind come
hand sinc t prejudic indecorum oversight

nunquam ita quicquam bene subducta ration ad vitam fuit
quin re aeta usu semper aliquid apport novi
aliquid moneant ut illa quae scire te creda nescia
Et quae tibi putari prima exercendo ut repudia

neer ought yet first contriv d fit
but use age someth would alter
advis thee better upon perus
make thee say thou takst refus

but resolv never put treatis ne quid
nimis hereaft add alter retract done the last
greatest except divin meddl
physic

tantumn est ab tua otii tibi
aliena ut cure eaqu nihil quae ad te attin

which menedemu object chreme much leisur littl
busi mine look men matter concern
what physic quod medicorum est promitt medici
the lacedaemonian counsel state matter
debauch fellow spake excel well purpos speech
gener approv grave senat step mean would

and yet crime us unknown
our son shall mark come age

latter end know whose oracl like wors T
deni world alter everi day ruunt urb regna

vice diseas symptom folli mad still
and river see keep like name place

present

when mad like opprest
who discern one mad man rest

but put case perceiv one manifestli convict

clame licet et mare coelo

common sens uter est insanior horum democritu

ride ass sail along anticyra ship fool
compani togeth need much labour prove say

believ without oath say word fool refer
though likewis fool madmen mad
ask question said comic mercuri

justum ab injusti peter insipientia est

ll stand censur yet think

but forasmuch undertook first kingdom provinc famili

desipi omn aequ ac tu My first argument borrow solomon

hope fool isaiah pronounceth woe

much deceiv think well especi argument

lectori male feriato

Tu vero cavesi edico quisqui es ne temer sugil auctorem hujusc
operi aut cavil irridea imo ne vel ex aliorum censura tacit
obloquari vi dicam verbo nequid nasutulu inept improb aut falso
finga nam si tali revera sit qualem prae se fert junior democritu
seniori democrito saltem affini aut eju genium vel tantillum sapiat
actum de te censorem aequ ac delatorem aget econtra petulanti
splene cum sit sufflabit te joco comminuet sale addo etiam et
deo risui te sacrificabit

iterum moneo ne quid caviller ne dum democritum juniorem convicii
infam aut ignominios vituper de te non male sentientem tu idem
audia ab amico cordato quod olim vulgu abderitanum ab hippocr
concivem bene meritum et popularem suum democritum pro insano haben ne
tu democrit sapi stulti autem et insani abderitae

abderitana pectora plebi habe

haec te pauci admonitum volo male feriat lector abi

heraclit flea misero sic convenit aevo
nil nisi turp vide nil nisi trist vide
ride etiam quantumqu lubet democrit ride
non nisi vana vide non nisi stulta vide
Is fletu risu modo gaudeat unu utriqu
sit licet usqu labor sit licet usqu dolor
nunc ope est nam totu eheu jam desipit orbi
mill heracl millequ democr
nunc opu est tanta est insania transeat omni
mundu anticyra gramen helleborum

unless see noth base noth sad
laugh O democritu much pleas
unless see noth either vain foolish
let one rejoic smile tear
let labour pain offic
now ala foolish world becom

now much mad prevail world must

subsect V melancholi disposit improperli call
equivocations

melancholi subject present discours either disposit
habit In disposit transitori melancholi goe
come upon everi small occas sorrow need sick troubl fear
grief passion perturb mind manner care
discont thought causeth anguish dull heavi
vexat spirit way opposit pleasur mirth joy delight
caus froward us dislik In equivoc improp
sens call melancholi dull sad sour lumpish ill
dispos solitari way move displeas and melancholi
disposit man live free stoic none wise none
happi none patient gener godli divin
vindic well compos less time
feel smart melancholi sens charact
mortal man born woman short continu
full troubl zeno cato socrat aelian highli
commend moder temper noth could disturb go
come still socrat kept seren counten
miseri soever befel may believ plato discipl
much torment Q metellu valeriu give instanc
happi fortun man live born
flourish citi rome nobl parentag proper man person well
qualifi health rich honour senat consul happi
wife happi children c yet man void melancholi
share sorrow polycr samiu flung ring
sea would particip discont other
miracul restor shortli fish taken
angl free melancholi disposit No man cure
god bitter pang frequent passion
poet put upon In gener heaven
life sometim fair sometim overcast tempestu seren
rose flower prickl year temper summer
sometim hard winter drought pleasant shower
life intermix joy hope fear sorrow calumni invicem
cedunt dolor et voluptas success pleasur pain

medio de font leporum
surgit amari aliquid ipsi floribu angat

even midst laugh sorrow solomon hold
even midst feast jolliti austin infer
com st psalm grief discont inter
delicia semper aliquid saevi no strangulat pint honey thou
shalt like find gallon gall dram pleasur pound
pain inch mirth ell moan ivi doth oak
miseri encompass life and absurd ridicul
mortal man look perpetu tenur happi life noth
prosper pleasant hath bitter
complain grudg greek glukupikron mix
passion like chequer tabl black white men famili citi
fall wane trine sextil quartil
opposit We angel celesti power bodi
sun moon finish cours without offenc
constanc continu mani age subject infirm
miseri interrupt toss tumbl carri
everi small blast often molest disquiet upon slender
occas uncertain brittl trust unto
and know arm endur fit live
world one condol time know condit
reciprocalti pleasur pain still unit succeed
one anoth ring exi e mundo get thee gone henc thou canst
brook way avoid arm thyself
patienc magnanim oppos thyself unto suffer
afflict good soldier christ paul adviseth constantli
bear but forasmuch embrac good council
use aright rather mani brute beast give away
passion voluntari subject precipit labyrinth
care woe miseri suffer soul overcom
arm patienc ought falleth
oftentim disposit becom habit mani affect
contemn seneca note make diseas even one
distil yet grown custom make cough continu
inveter causeth consumpt lung melancholi
provoc accord humour intend remit
men temperatur bodi ration soul better abl
make resist less affect for
fleabit one causeth insuffer torment anoth one
singular moder wellcompos carriag happili
overcom second whit abl sustain upon everi small
occas misconceiv abus injuri grief disgrac loss cross
humour c solitari idl yield far passion
complexion alter digest hinder sleep gone spirit
obscur heart heavi hypochondri misaffect wind
cruditi sudden overtak overcom melancholi
As man imprison debt gaol everi
creditor bring action like hold If
discont seiz upon patient instant perturb
qua data porta ruunt set upon like lame dog
brokenwing goos droop pine away brought last
ill habit maladi melancholi So philosoph
make eight degre heat cold may make eightyeight
melancholi part affect divers seiz
plung less infern gulf wade deeper
but melancholi fit howsoev pleas first displeas
violent tyrann seiz time yet
fit say men affect improperli call
continu come go object aye move thi
melancholi treat habit mosbu sonticus
chronicus chronic continu diseas settl humour
aurelianu other call errant fix
long increas pleasant pain grown habit
hardli remov


sect I memb

subsect I digress anatomy

befor proceed defin diseas melancholi
discours farther hold impertin make brief
digress anatomi bodi faculti soul
better understand follow mani hard word
often occur mirach hypocondri emerod c imagin
reason humour spirit vital natur anim nerv vein arteri
chylu pituita vulgar easili perceiv

subsect X of understanding

understand power soul perceiv know
rememb judg well singular univers certain innat
notic begin art reflect action judgeth
do examin out definit besid
chief offic apprehend judg perform without
help instrument organ three differ appear betwixt
man beast As first sens comprehend singular

thirdli brute reflect upon bee inde make neat

judg hi object god ens natur
whatsoev understood success apprehend the
object first move understand sensibl thing
discours mind find corpor substanc thenc

judgment the common divis understand agent

necessari follow discours

synteresi purer part conscienc innat habit

conclus syllog familiar exampl regulu

dictamen appli dictat like regulu thou
wouldst anoth man falsifi oath break promis
thee conscienc conclud therefor regulu thou dost well perform
thi promis oughtest keep thine oath more religi
melancholi


subsect xi of will

thing judg apprehend

appetit

subsect iii of matter melancholy

Of matter melancholi much question betwixt avicen
galen may read cardan contradict valesiu
controversi montanu prosper calenu capivacciu bright
ficinu written either whole tract copious
sever treatis subject what humour
whenc proce engend bodi neither galen
old writer hath suffici discuss jacchinu think
neoter agre montanu consult hold melancholi
materi immateri doth arculanu materi one
four humour mention natur the immateri
adventiti acquisit redund unnatur artifici
hercul de saxonia resid spirit alon proceed
hot cold dri moist distemperatur without matter alter
brain function paracelsu wholli reject derid
divis four humour complexion galenist gener
approv subscrib opinion montanu

thi materi melancholi either simpl mix offend quantiti
qualiti vari accord place settleth brain
spleen mesara vein heart womb stomach differ accord
mixtur natur humour amongst four unnatur
adust humour divers temper mingl If natur
melancholi abound bodi cold dri
bodi well abl bear must need distemp
saith faventiu diseas deprav
whether aris melancholi choler adust blood
produceth like effect montaltu contend come
adust humour part hot dri some differ find whether
melancholi matter may engend four humour
colour temper galen hold may engend three alon
exclud phlegm pituita whose true assert valesiu
menardu stiffli maintain doth fuschiu montaltu
montanu how say white becom black but hercul de saxonia
lib post de mela c  cardan opposit part
may engend phlegm etsi raro contingat though seldom come
pass guianeriu laurentiu c  melanct
book de anima chap humour call asininam dull
swinish melancholi saith eyewit
wecker from melancholi adust ariseth one kind choler anoth
brutish anoth phlegm dull last
blood best Of cold dri other hot
dri vari accord mixtur intend
remit and inde rodericu fon con  l  determin
ichor serou matter thicken becom phlegm phlegm
degener choler choler adust becom aeruginosa melancholia
vinegar purest wine putrifi exhal purer spirit
made becom sour sharp sharp humour
proce much wake troublesom thought dream c
conclud If humour cold saith faventinu
caus dotag produceth milder symptom hot rash
rave mad inclin If brain hot anim spirit
hot much mad follow violent action cold fatuiti
sottish capivacciu the colour mixtur vari
likewis accord mixtur hot cold t sometim black
sometim altomaru the melaneliu prove galen
hippocr book melancholi least give
instanc burn coal hot shine cold
look black doth humour thi divers melancholi matter
produceth divers effect If within bodi
putrifi causeth black jaundic putrifi quartan agu

kind mad dotag place


subsect iv of speci kind melancholy

when matter diver confus otherwis

subsect iii of witch magician caus melancholy

you heard devil shall hear
perform instrument mani time wors
possibl satisfi reveng lust caus
mischief multa enim mala non egisset daemon nisi provocatu sagis
erastu think much harm never done
provok witch He appear samuel shape
witch endor let alon repres serpent
pharaoh presenc magician urg unto nec morbo
vel hominibu vel bruti infligeret erastu maintain si saga
quiescerent men cattl might go free witch would let
alon mani deni witch harm
opinion wieru lib  cap  de praestig daem austin
lerchem dutch writer biarmanu ewichiu euwaldu countryman
scot horac

somnia terror magico miracula saga
nocturno lemur portentaqu thessala risu
excipiunt

say laugh indign scheme

the nightli goblin enchant spell

divin physician philosoph austin hemingiu danaeu chytraeu

deal ex part implicite explicite king hath well
defin mani subdivis mani sever speci

heretofor magic hath publicli profess former
time salamanca krakow place though
censur sever univers gener contradict
though practis still maintain excus tanquam re
secreta quae non nisi viri magni et peculiari beneficio de coelo

subsect iv star caus sign physiognomi metoposcopi
chiromancy

natur caus either primari univers secondari
particular primari caus heaven planet star c
influenc astrolog hold produc like effect
stand discuss obiter whether star caus sign
apologis judic astrolog If either sextu empericu picu

subsect I bad diet caus substanc qualiti meats

accord propos method open hitherto secondari
caus inbr us must proceed outward
adventiti happen unto us born and either
evid remot inward anteced nearest contin caus
call these outward remot preced caus subdivid
necessari necessari necessari avoid
alter us use abus six
nonnatur thing much spoken amongst physician
princip caus diseas for almost everi consult wherea
shall come speak caus fault found
part object patient peccavit circa re sex non naturales
hath still offend one six montanu consil  consult
melancholi jew give sentenc frisemelica
place counsel censur melancholi soldier assign
reason maladi offend six nonnatur
thing outward caus came inward
obstruct rest

these six nonnatur thing diet retent evacu
materi make new matter els
convers keep expel the four air exercis
sleep wake perturb mind alter
matter the first diet consist meat drink
causeth melancholi offend substanc accid
quantiti qualiti like and well may call materi caus
sinc ferneliu hold hath power beget
diseas yield matter susten neither air
perturb evid caus take place
work effect except constitut bodi prepar
humour concur that man may say diet mother
diseas let father alon melancholi
frequent maladi aris mani physician confess
written copiou volum one subject natur qualiti
manner meat name galen isaac jew halyabba avicenna
mesu also four arabian gordoniu villanovanu wecker johann
bruerinu sitologia de esculenti et poculentis michael savanarola
tract  c  anthoni fumanellu lib de regimin senum curio
comment schola salerna godefridu steckiu art med marciliu
cognatu ficinu ranzoviu fonseca lessiu magninu regim
sanitatis frietagiu hugo fridevalliu c besid mani
english almost everi peculiar physician discourseth larg
peculiar meat chapter melancholi yet book
hand everi man briefli touch kind meat
engend humour sever speci
avoid how alter chang matter spirit first
humour preserv constitut bodi
ferneliu other show hasten thing first
diet offend substanc

second saith gal l  c  de alim fac condemn
succeed author breed gross melancholi blood good
sound strong constitut labour men order
aright corn young ox geld meat everi speci
held best old tire labour
prefer aubanu sabellicu commend portug beef
savouri best easiest digest commend
reject unfit lead resti life way inclin

melancholici aegritudinibu capiuntur

fishes rhasi magninu discommend fish say

semper plu succi deteriori habent

all fish stand pool lake frequent
Do ever yield bad juic nourish

lamprey paulu joviu c  de piscibu fluvial highli magnifi
saith none speak inepti et scrupulosi
scrupul person eel c  abhorreth place
time physician detest especi solstic

conger sturgeon turbot mackerel skate

carp fish know determin franciscu bonsuetu
account muddi fish hippolitu salvianu book de piscium
natura et praeparatione print rome folio
eleg pictur esteem carp better slimi wateri meat
paulu joviu side disallow tench approv doth
dubraviu book fishpond freitagiu extol
excel wholesom meat put amongst fish best rank
countri gentlemen store pond almost
fish but controversi easili decid judgment
bruerinu l  c  the differ riseth site natur
pool sometim muddi sometim sweet tast
place whenc taken In like manner almost may conclud
fresh fish but see rondoletiu belloniu oribasiu
lib  cap  isaac l  especi hippolitu salvianu

subsect iii custom diet delight appetit necess
caus hinder

No rule gener admit except therefor
hath hitherto said shall otherwis put men
common inconveni proceed substanc
meat intemper unseason use custom somewhat detract
qualifi accord hippocr  aphori
such thing long accustom though evil
natur yet less offens otherwis might well
object mere tyranni live strict rule
physic custom doth alter natur
use make bad meat wholesom unseason time caus
disord cider perri windi drink fruit windi
cold part yet shire england normandi
franc guipuscoa spain t common drink
whit offend In spain itali africa live
root raw herb camel milk agre well
stranger caus much grievanc In wale lacticinii vescuntur
humphrey llwyd confesseth cambrobriton eleg
epistl abraham orteliu live white meat holland
fish root butter day greec belloniu
observ much rather feed fish flesh with us maxima
par victu carn consistit feed flesh part saith
polydor virgil northern countri would
offens us live diet live We
drink beer wine use oil butter north
great eater spare hotter countri yet
follow custom well pleas An ethiopian old
see european eat bread wonder quomodo stercoribu vescent
viverimus could eat kind meat much differ
countrymen diet mine author infer si qui
illorum victum apud no aemulari vellet man feed
us would one nourish cicuta aconitum hellebor
At day china common peopl live manner altogeth
root herb wealthiest hors ass mule dog
catflesh delightsom rest mat ricciu jesuit
relat live mani year amongst the tartar eat raw meat
commonli horseflesh drink milk blood nomad
old et lac concretum cum sanguin potat equino they scoff

fit men yet scalig account sound witti nation
live hundr year even civilest countri thu
benedict jesuit observ travel great mogul
court land pekin ricciu contend cambulu
cataia In scandia bread usual dri fish likewis

dithmaru bleskeniu butter chees fish drink water
lodg ground In america mani place bread

familiarli drink salt seawat live

serpent spider diver place eat man flesh raw
roast even emperor montezuma In coast

full stomach idl person would present death

find common experi come far countri use

distemp reason fruit peregrina etsi suavia solent

pleasant caus notabl alter distemp On side use

subsect iv retent evacu caus how

Of retent evacu diver kind either
concomit assist sole caus mani time melancholi
galen reduceth defect abund head other all
separ remain

costiveness In first rank may well reckon
costiv keep ordinari excrement often
causeth diseas melancholi particular celsu
lib  cap saith It produceth inflamm head dull
cloudi headach c prosper calenu lib de atra bile
distemp organ mind troubl
sometim sole caus mad may read
first book skenkiu medicin observ A young merchant
go nordel fair germani ten day space never went
stool return grievous melancholi think
rob would persuad money gone
friend thought philtrum given cneliu physician
sent found costiv alon caus
thereupon gave clyster speedili recov
trincavelliu consult  lib  saith much melancholi lawyer
administ physic rodericu fonseca consult  tom
patient eight day bound therefor

necessari time ferneliu account path lib
cap  suppress haemorrhoid monthli issu women bleed
nose immoder use venu ordinari
issu

detent haemorrhoid monthli issu villanovanu breviar

men unseason cure haemorrhoid corrupt

de hum commen  ad text  illustr exampl luciu
martiu cure mad contract mean and
skenkiu hath two instanc two melancholi mad women
caus suppress month the may said
bleed nose suddenli stop formerli
use villanovanu urgeth and fuchsiu lib  sect
cap  stiffli maintain that without great danger issu may
stay

case intermiss not use hurt mani

kind melancholi stale maid nun widow ob suppressionem

artifici evacu much like effect hot hous bath
bloodlet purg unseason immoder use bath dri
much use excess natur artifici offend
extrem hot cold one dri refriger overmuch
montanu consil  saith overheat liver joh struthiu
stigmat arti l  c  contend one stay longer
ordinari bath go oft unseason time putrefi
humour bodi To purpos write magninu l  c
guianeriu tract  c  utterli disallow hot bath
melancholi adust saw saith man labour
gout freed maladi came bath instantli
cure diseas got anoth wors mad but
judgment vari humour doth hot cold bath may good
one melancholi man bad anoth cure
parti may caus second

phlebotomy phlebotomi mani time neglect may much harm
bodi manifest redund bad humour melancholi
blood humour heat boil use time
parti affect inflam great danger mad
unadvisedli importun immoder use doth much harm
refriger bodi dull spirit consum joh
curio th chapter well reprehend kind let blood
doth hurt good the humour rage much
far avoid melancholi increaseth
weakeneth sight prosper calenu observ much
phlebotomi except keep good diet yea
leonarti jacchinu speak experi the
blood much blacker mani men let blood
first for caus belik salust salvinianu l  c
admit hear bloodlet diseas except
manifest proceed blood appear word
place master hospit mad men found long
experi kind evacu either head arm
part harm good To opinion felix plater
quit opposit though wink disallow quit contradict
phlebotomi melancholi yet long experi found innumer
save twenti nay sixti time let blood
live happili It ordinari thing old galen time
take men six pound blood dare scarc
take ounc sed viderint medici great book written
subject

purg upward downward abund bad humour omit may
worst likewis preced overmuch frequent
violent weakeneth strength saith fuchsiu l
sect c  strong abl endur physic yet
bring ill habit make bodi better
apothecari shop like infirm must need follow


subsect V bad air caus melancholy

air caus great moment produc diseas
still taken bodi respir
inner part If impur foggi deject spirit
causeth diseas infect heart paulu hath lib  c
avicenna lib gal de san tuenda mercuriali montaltu c
ferneliu saith A thick air thickeneth blood humour
lemniu reckon two main thing profit
pernici bodi air diet peculiar diseas noth
sooner causeth jobertu hold air wherein breath
live such air spirit spirit
humour It offend commonli hot dri
thick fuligin cloudi bluster tempestu air bodin
fifth book de repub cap  method histori prove
hot countri troubl melancholi
therefor spain africa asia minor great number mad men
insomuch compel citi note build peculiar
hospit leo afer lib  de fessa urbe orteliu
zuinger confirm much ordinarili choler
speech scarc two word pass without rail chide common

subsect vi immoder exercis caus solitari
idleness

noth good may abus noth better exercis
opportun use preserv bodi noth bad
unseason violent overmuch ferneliu galen path lib
c  saith that much exercis weari consum spirit

subsect vii sleep wake causes

what formerli said exercis may repeat sleep noth
better moder sleep noth wors extrem
unseason use It receiv opinion melancholi man
sleep overmuch somnu supra modum prodest antidot
noth offend causeth maladi sooner wake yet
case sleep may harm good phlegmat
swinish cold sluggish melancholi melancthon speak
think water sigh part c It dull spirit
overmuch sens fill head full gross humour causeth
distil rheum great store excrement brain
part fuchsiu speak sleep like mani
dormic Or use daytim upon full stomach bodi
illcompos rest hard meat increaseth fear dream
incubu night walk cri much unquiet sleep
prepar bodi one observ mani peril diseas but
said wake overmuch symptom ordinari caus

overthrow natur heat causeth cruditi hurt concoct

subsect I passion perturb mind caus
melancholy

As gymnosophist plutarch made answer alexand demand
spake best everi one fellow speak better
may say caus shall requir
greatest everi one grievou passion
greatest A frequent ordinari caus melancholi
fulmen perturbationum picolomineu call thunder lightn
perturb causeth violent speedi alter
microcosm mani time subvert good estat temperatur
for bodi work upon mind bad humour troubl
spirit send gross fume brain per consequens
disturb soul faculti

corpu onustum
hesterni vitii animum quoqu praegravat una

fear sorrow c ordinari symptom diseas
side mind effectu work upon bodi produc
passion perturb miracul alter melancholi
despair cruel diseas sometim death insomuch
true plato saith charmid omnia corpori mala ab anima

subsect ii of forc imagination

what imagin suffici declar digress
anatomi soul point wonder effect
power emin especi rageth
melancholi person keep speci object long
mistak amplifi continu strong medit
length produceth parti real effect causeth mani
maladi and although phantasi subordin faculti
reason rule yet mani men inward
outward distemperatur defect organ unapt otherwis
contamin likewis unapt hinder hurt thi see
verifi sleeper reason humour concours vapour

subsect iii divis perturbations

perturb passion troubl phantasi though dwell
confin sens reason yet rather follow sens
reason drown corpor organ sens they
commonli reduc two inclin irasc concupisc
the thomist subdivid eleven six covet five

nil homin terra spirat miserum magi alma

No creatur miser man gener molest miseri
bodi miseri mind miseri heart miseri asleep
miseri awak miseri wheresoev turn bernard found
nunquid tentatio est vita humana super terram A mere temptat

et qui potest molestia et difficult pati who endur

deject advers fortun foolish miser In
advers wish prosper prosper afraid
advers what mediocr may found where temptat what

tempestu storm troublesom wave infinit

tantum malorum pelagu aspicio
Ut non sit ind enatandi copia

halcyonian time wherein man hold secur agre
present estat boethiu infer someth
everi one us trial seek tri abhor
earnestli wish eagerli covet eftsoon weari thu

timor inter et iras betwixt fall fall c bangl

subsect xiv philautia selflov vainglori prais honour
immoder applaus pride overmuch joy c causes

selflov pride vainglori caecu amor sui chrysostom
call one devil three great net bernard arrow
pierceth soul slay sli insens enemi
perceiv main caus where neither anger lust covet fear
sorrow c perturb lay hold slyli
insens pervert us quem non gula vicit philautia superavit saith
cyprian surfeit could overtak selflov hath overcom
He hath scorn money bribe gift upright otherwis
sincer hath insert fond imagin sustain
tyrann concupisc bodi hath lost honour
captiv vainglori chrysostom sup io tu sola animum mentemqu
peruri gloria A great assault caus present maladi although
part neglect take notic yet violent
batter soul causeth melancholi dotag thi pleas humour
soft whisper popular air amabili insania delect
frenzi irrefrag passion menti gratissimu error
accept diseas sweetli set upon us ravisheth sens
lull soul asleep puff heart mani bladder
without feel insomuch misaffect
never much perceiv think cure We commonli love
best maladi doth us harm will
hurt adulationibu nostri libentur facemus saith jerom
love love O bonciari suav suav fuit te
tali haec tribui T sweet hear and plini doth
ingenu confess dear friend augurinu thi write
accept especi speak us again littl
maximu express pleas hear
commend though smile least iron
parasit bedaub us fals encomium mani princ choos
quum tale quid nihil intra se repererint know come
far short mous eleph virtu yet doth us
good though seem mani time angri blush
prais yet soul inwardli rejoic puff us t fallax
suavita blandu daemon make us swell beyond bound forget
her two daughter light mind immoder joy
pride exclud concomit vice iodocu
lorichiu reckon brag hypocrisi peevish curios

now common caus mischief ariseth other
activ passiv It proce inwardli
activ caus overween conceit good part

no interim quod attinet nec enim immun ab hac noxa sumu idem realu
manet idem nobi et si non multo graviu crimen objici potest nostra
enim culpa sit nostra incuria nostra avaritia quod tam frequent
foedaequ fiant ecclesia nundination templum est vaenal deusqu
tot sord invehantur tanta grassetur impieta tanta nequitia tam
insanu miseriarum euripu et turbarum aestuarium nostro inquam omnium
academicorum imprimi vitio sit quod tot resp mali afficiatur nobi
seminarium ultro malum hoc accersimu et quavi contumelia quavi
interim miseria digni qui pro virili non occurrimu quid enim fieri poss
speramu quum tot indi sine delectu pauper alumni terra filii et
cujuscunqu ordini homuncion ad gradu certatim admittantur qui si
definitionem distinctionemqu unam aut alteram memorit edidicerint et
pro tot anno dialectica posuerint non refert quo profectu qual
demum sint idiota nugator otiator aleator compotor indigni
libidini voluptatumqu administri sponsi penelop nebulon
alcinoiqu modo tot anno academia insumpserint et se pro togati
venditarint lucri causa et amicorum intercessu praesentantur addo etiam
et magnifici nonnunquam elogii morum et scientia et jam valedicturi
testimonialibu hisc litteri amplissim conscripti eorum gratiam
honorantur abii qui fidei suae et existimationi jacturam proculdubio
faciunt doctor enim et professor quod ait ill id unum
curant ut ex professionibu frequentibu et tumultuarii potiu quam
legitimi commoda sua promover et ex dispendio publico suum faciant
incrementum Id solum voti habent annui plerumqu magistratu ut ab
incipientium numero pecunia emung nec multum interest qui sint
literator literati modo pingu nitidi ad aspectum speciosi et
quod verbo dicam pecuniosi sint philosophastri licentiantur
artibu artem qui non habent eosqu sapient ess jubent qui
nulla praediti sunt sapientia et nihil ad gradum praeterquam vell
adferunt theologastri solvant modo sati superqu docti per omn
honorum gradu evehuntur et ascendunt atqu hinc fit quod tam vile
scurra tot passim idiota literarum crepusculo positi larva pastorum
circumforanei vagi barbi fungi crassi asini merum pecu
sacrosancto theologia aditu illoti pedibu irrump praeter
inverecundam frontem adferent nihil vulgar quasdam quisquilia et
scholarium quaedam nugamenta indigna quae vel recipiantur trivii hoc
illud indignum genu hominum et famelicum indigum vagum ventri
mancipium ad stivam potiu relegandum ad hara aptiu quam ad ara quod
divina hasc litera turpit prostituit hi sunt qui pulpita complent
aed nobilium irrepunt et quum reliqui vita destituantur subsidii ob
corpori et animi egestatem aliarum repub partium minim capac sint
ad sacram hanc anchoram confugiunt sacerdotium quovi modo captant non
ex sincerit quod paulu ait sed cauponant verbum dei Ne
qui interim viri boni detractum quid putet quo habet ecclesia
anglicana quamplurimo eggregi docto illustr intacta fama
homin et plure forsan quam quaevi europa provincia ne qui
florentisimi academii quae viro undiquaqu doctissimo omni virtutum
gener suspiciendo abund producunt Et multo plure utraqu habitura
multo splendidior futura si non hae sord splendidum lumen eju
obfuscar obstaret corruptio et cauponant quaedam harpya
proletariiqu bonum hoc nobi non invider nemo enim tam caeca ment
qui non hoc ipsum videat nemo tam stolido ingenio qui non intelligat tam
pertinaci judicio qui non agnoscat ab idioti circumforanei sacram
pollui theologiam ac caelest musa quasi prophanum quiddam prostitui
vile anima et effront sic enim lutheru alicubi vocat
lucelli causa ut musca ad mulctra ad nobilium et heroum mensa
advol spem sacerdotii cujuslibet honori officii quamvi
aulam urbem se ingerunt ad quodvi se ministerium componunt Ut nervi
alieni mobil lignum ducitur hor lib sat  offam
sequent psittacorum praeda spem quidvi effutiunt
obsecundant paras erasmu ait quidvi docent dicunt
scribunt suadent et contra conscientiam probant non ut salutarem reddant
gregem sed ut magnificam sibi parent fortunam opinion quasvi
et decreta contra verbum dei astruunt ne non offend patronum sed ut
retin favorem procerum et populi plausum sibiqu ipsi ope
accumul Eo etenim plerunqu animo ad theologiam accedunt non ut rem
divinam sed ut suam facient non ad ecclesia bonum promovendum sed
expilandum quaerent quod paulu ait non quae jesu christi sed quae
sua non domini thesaurum sed ut sibi suisqu thesauriz nec tantum
ii qui vilirri fortuna et abjecta sorti sunt hoc usu est sed
et medio summo elato ne dicam episcopo hoc malum invasit
dicit pontific sacri quid facit aurum summo saep viro
transverso agit avaritia et qui reliqui morum probit praelucer
hi facem praeferunt ad simoniam et corruptioni hunc scopulum
impingent non tondent pecu sed deglubunt et quocunqu se conferunt
expil exhauriunt abradunt magnum fama suae si non anima naufragium
facient ut non ab infimi ad summo sed summi ad infimo malum
promanass videatur et illud verum sit quod ill olim lusit emerat ill
priu vender jure potest simoniacu enim quod cum leon dicam
gratiam non accepit si non accipit non habet et si non habet nec
gratu potest ess tantum enim absunt istorum nonnulli qui ad clavum
sedent promovendo reliquo ut penitu impedi probe sibi conscii
quibu artibu illic pervenerint nam qui ob litera emersiss illo
credat desipit qui vero ingenii eruditioni experientia probitati
pietati et musarum id ess pretium putat quod olim revera fuit hodi
promittitur planissim insanit utcunqu vel undecunqu malum hoc
originem ducat non ultra quaeram ex primordii caepit vitiorum
colluvi omni calamita omn miseriarum agmen ecclesiam invehitur
hinc tam frequen simonia hinc orta querela fraud impostura ab hoc
font se derivarunt omn nequitia Ne quid obit dicam de ambition
adulation plusquam aulica ne tristi domicaenio labor de luxu de
foedo nonnunquam vita exemplo quo nonnullo offendunt de compotation
sybaritica c hinc ill squalor academicu trist hac tempest
camena quum quivi homunculu artium ignaru hic artibu assurgat hunc
modum promoveatur et ditescat ambitiosi appellationibu insigni et
multi dignitatibu augustu vulgi oculo perstringat bene se habeat et
grandia gradien majestatem quandam ac amplitudinem prae se feren
miramqu sollicitudinem barba reverendu toga nitidu purpura coruscu
supellectili splendor et famulorum numero maxim conspicuu qual
statua quod ait ill quae sacri aedibu columni imponuntur
velut oneri cedent videntur ac si insudar quum revera sensu sint
carent et nihil saxeam adjuv firmitatem atlant videri volunt
quum sint statua lapidea umbratil revera homuncion fungi forsan et
bardi nihil saxo different quum interim docti viri et vila
sanctiori ornamenti praediti qui aestum diei sustin iniqua sort
serviant minimo forsan salario contenti puri nominibu nuncupati
humil obscuri multoqu dignior licet egent inhonorati vitam
privam privatam agant tenuiqu sepulti sacerdotio vel collegii sui
aeternum incarcerati inglori delitesc sed nolo diutiu hanc mover
sentinam hinc illa lachryma lugubri musarum habitu hinc ipsa
religio quod cum secellio dicam ludibrium et contemptum adducitur
abjectum sacerdotium atqu haec ubi fiunt ausim dicer et pulidum
putidi dicterium de clero usurpar putidum vulgu inop rude
sordidum melancholicum miserum despicabil contemnendum

subsect nonnecessari remot outward adventiti accident
caus first nurse

discours preced member nonnecessari follow

casualti multitud call necessari accord
ferneliu may avoid use without necess mani
accident caus shall entreat might well
reduc former avoid fatal
happen us though accident unawar time
rest conting inevit properli insert rank
caus To reckon thing imposs therefor
remark conting caus produc melancholi
briefli speak order

subsect ii educ caus melancholy

educ accident caus melancholi may justli challeng
next place man escap bad nurs may undon evil
bring jason pratensi put educ princip
caus bad parent stepmoth tutor master teacher rigor
sever remiss indulg side often fountain
further diseas parent tuition
oversight children offend mani time stern alway

melancholy

subsect vi poverti want caus melancholy

poverti want violent oppugn unwelcom guest much
abhor men may omit speak apart poverti

observat l  ancient man could
affect continu melancholi pine away grief

unkind unnatur friend evil neighbour bad servant debt
debat c t chilon sentenc come aeri alieni et liti est
miseria miseri usuri commonli togeth suretyship bane
mani famili spond praesto noxa est shall sore vex
sureti stranger prov xi hateth suretyship
sure content brawl lawsuit fall neighbour
friends discordia demens virg aen  equal first
griev mani man vex soul nihil sane miserabiliu eorum

subsect ii distemperatur particular part causes

there almost part bodi distemp doth
caus maladi brain part heart liver spleen
stomach matrix womb pyloru mirach mesenteri hypochondri
mesara vein word saith arculanu part
causeth melancholi either adust doth expel
superflu nutriment savanarola pract major rubric
tract  cap  opinion melancholi engend

instar omnium lib med partic  cap  confirm much
put matter melancholi sometim stomach liver
heart brain spleen mirach hypochondri melancholi humour
resid liver well cleans melancholi blood

return last treat brief three particular speci

subsect V caus melancholi whole body

As caus kind melancholi inward outward
inward liver apt engend humour
spleen weak natur abl discharg offic A melancholi
temperatur retent haemorrhoid monthli issu bleed nose
long diseas agu six nonnatur thing increas but
especi bad diet piso think puls salt meat shellfish
chees black wine c mercuriali averro avicenna condemn
herb galen lib de loc affect cap  especi cabbag So
likewis fear sorrow discont c and thu
brief gener particular caus melancholi

now go brag thi present happi whosoev thou art brag thi
temperatur thi good part insult triumph boast thou seest
brittl state thou art soon thou mayst deject mani
sever way bad diet bad air small loss littl sorrow
discont agu c mani sudden accid may procur thi ruin
small tenur happi thou hast life weak silli
creatur thou art humbl thyself therefor mighti hand
god peter v know thyself acknowledg thi present miseri make
right use qui stat videat ne cadat thou dost flourish
hast bona animi corpori et fortunae good bodi mind fortun
nesci quid seru secum vesper ferat thou knowest storm
tempest late even may bring Be secur sober
watch fortunam reverent habe fortun rich
sick poor moder thyself said

subsect ii symptom sign mind

fear arculanu in rhasi ad almansor cap
symptom infinit inde vari accord
parti scarc one thousand dote alik

rest fear sorrow frequent caus
persever long accord hippocr galen aphor
assur sign insepar companion charact

never perceiv fault for diocl

except aphor hippocr t alway true
gener understood fear sorrow common symptom
melancholi upon seriou consider find saith
some inde sad fear fear
sad neither fear sad four kind except
fanat person cassandra nanto nicostrata mopsu

atra bile perciti demoniac person speak strang

part continu baptista portia confin fear sorrow

pector concipiet nil nisi trist suo

He imagin naught save sad heart

counten alter sudden heart heavi irksom thought
crucifi soul instant mope weari life
kill A fifth complain youth sixth middl

gener thu much may conclud melancholi
pleasant first say menti gratissimu error
delightsom humour alon dwell alon walk alon medit lie

imagin unto they never better pleas

continu peradventur mani year reason strong temperatur

O trist nomen dii odibil
melancholia lacrymosa cocyti filia
Tu tartari specubu opaci edita
erinni utero quam megara suo tulit
Et ab uberibu aluit cuiqu parvida
amarulentum os lac alecto dedit
omn abominabilem te daemon
produxer lucem exitio mortalium et paulo post
non jupit ferit tale telum fulmini
non ulla sic procella saevit aequori
non impetuosi tanta vi est turbini
An aspero sustineo morsu cerberi
num viru echidna membra mea depascitur
aut tunica sani tincta nessi sanguini
illacrymabil et immedicabil malum hoc

O sad odiou name name fell
Is melancholi brat hell
there born hellish dark doth dwell
the furi brought megara teat
alecto gave bitter milk eat
and conspir d bane mortal men
To bring devil black den
jupit thunderbolt storm sea
nor whirlwind doth heart much dismay
what bit fierc cerberu
Or stung serpent pestifer
Or put shirt dipt nessu blood
My pain past cure physic good

subsect I physician patient physic

Of divers gift apostl paul saith god hath bestow
man physic least necessari especi
conduc good mankind next therefor god

must seek reli upon physician manu dei saith

success ver It therefor doubt seek

subsect iii concern physic

physic last place consid lord hath
creat medicin earth wise abhor
ecclu xxxviii  ver doth apothecari make
confect c Of medicin divers infinit kind
plant metal anim c sever natur good
one hurt anoth noxiou correct art
wholesom good simpl mix c therefor left manag
discreet skil physician thenc appli man use To
purpos invent method sever rule art put
remedi order particular end physic hippocr
defin nought els addit subtract
requir diseas melancholi ought
accur mercuriali acknowledgeth common
affect time therefor fit understood sever
prescript method find sever men take upon cure
maladi one medicin sever appli panacea aurum
potabile much controvert day herba solis c
paracelsu reduceth diseas four princip head
severinu ravelascu leo suaviu other adher imit
leprosi gout dropsi fallingsick To reduc rest
leprosi ulcer itch furfur scab c To gout stone colic
toothach headach c To dropsi agu jaundic cachexia c To
fallingsick belong palsi vertigo cramp convuls incubu
apoplexi c If four princip cure saith
ravelascu inferior cure remedi commonli
serv gener contradict peculiar
diseas melancholi speak find sever cure
sever method prescript they intend practic cure
melancholi saith duretu note holleriu set nine peculiar
scope end savanarola prescrib seven especi canon aelianu
montaltu cap  faventinu empir hercul de saxonia c
sever injunct rule tend one end the
ordinari threefold mean follow greek diaitaetika
pharmaceutica chirurgica diet live apothecari chirurgeri
wecker crato guianeriu c prescrib
insist speak order


sect memb

subsect I diet rectifi substance

diet greek diaitaetika victus live accord
fuchsiu other comprehend six nonnatur thing

subsect ii diet rectifi quantity

man alon saith cardan eat drink without appetit useth
pleasur without necess anima vitio thenc come mani
inconveni unto for meat whatsoev though otherwis
wholesom good unseason taken immoder use

preced distemperatur saith avicenna noth

et caenis polydor note liber feeder

air rectifi with digress air

As longwing hawk first whistl fist mount
aloft pleasur fetcheth mani circuit air still
soar higher higher till come full pitch
end game sprung come amain stoop upon sudden
come last ampl field air wherein
may freeli expati exercis recreat awhil rove

exercis rectifi bodi mind

must oppos antidot moder season use

nay shall scriptur which like apothecari shop
wherein remedi infirm mind purg cordial
alter corrobor lenit c everi diseas soul
saith austin hath peculiar medicin scriptur
requir sick man take potion god hath alreadi

memb
against melancholi itself

everi man saith seneca think burthen heaviest
melancholi man other complain weari life
abhor compani light fear sorrow suspicion anguish mind
bash dread symptom bodi mind must need
aggrav miseri yet compar maladi
heinou taken for first diseas either habit
disposit curabl incur If new disposit t commonli
pleasant may help If inveter habit yet
lucida intervalla sometim well sometim ill
continu vejent roman t hosti magi
assiduu quam gravis durabl enemi danger amongst
mani inconveni comfort annex first
catch erasmu comfort grievous sick
stone though troublesom intoler pain
yet whit offens other loathsom spectat
ghastli fulsom terribl plagu apoplexi leprosi wound
sore tetter pox pestil agu either admit compani
terrifi offend present In maladi
wholli symptom dread
compar opposit extrem they part bash suspici
solitari c therefor ambiti impud intrud
sharker conycatch prowler smellfeast prater
pander parasit bawd drunkard whoremast necess defect
compel honest mitio told demea comedi

haec si nequ ego nequ tu fecimu
non sinit egesta facer no

bad worst t dame melancholi kept us non deerat
volunta sed facultas

sect memb

subsect I of physic cureth medicines

after long tediou discours six nonnatur thing
sever rectif comprehend diet come
last pharmaceutice kind physic cureth
medicin apothecari part make mingl sell
shop mani cavil kind physic hold unnecessari
unprofit diseas countri
use least live longest best health hector
boethiu relat isl orcad peopl still sound
bodi mind without use physic live commonli year
orteliu itinerari inhabit forest arden
pain longliv sound c martianu capella
speak indian time saith much like
western indian bigger ordinari men bred coars
longliv insomuch die hundr year age went
time c damianu ago saxo grammaticu aubanu bohemu
say like live norway lapland finmark biarmia
corelia scandia northern countri
health longliv place use
physic name heard dithmaru bleskeniu
accur descript iceland make mention amongst
matter inhabit manner live
dri fish instead bread butter chees salt meat part
drink water whey yet without physic physician live mani
year find relat leriu
writer indian america paulu joviu descript
britain levinu lemniu observ much island
old use physic amongst us littl
day except nice idl citizen surfeit courtier
stallf gentlemen lubber the countri peopl use kitchen physic
common experi tell vi live freest manner
infirm make least use apothecari physic mani
overthrown preposter use therebi get bane
might otherwis escap think physician kill mani
save tell quot themison aegro autumno occiderit
uno how mani murder make year quibu impun licet hominem
occidere may freeli kill folk reward
accord dutch proverb new physician must new churchyard
daili observ mani ill physician hand
happili escap given left god
natur t plini dilemma old everi
diseas either curabl incur man recov kill
way physic reject If deadli
cure may help requir physician natur expel
plato made great sign intemper corrupt
commonwealth lawyer physician abound roman
distast much often banish citi
plini celsu relat year admit It art
hold worthi name liber scienc law
neither pet and canonheriu patrician rome great
doctor one tribe prove sixteen argument
mercenari use base fiddler play
reward juridici medici fisco fa viver rapto t corrupt
trade scienc art profess begin practic
progress naught full impostur uncertainti doth
gener harm good the devil first inventor
inventum est medicina meum said apollo apollo
devil the greek first made art delud
apollo son priest oracl If may believ varro plini columella
best medicin deriv oracl aesculapiu
son templ erect deiti mani famou cure
lactantiu hold magician mere impostor
successor phaon podaliriu melampiu menecr anoth god

subsect V alter cordial corrobor resolv
reliqu mend temperament

becaus humour malign hard remov
reliqu cleans alter cordial mean
temper alter amend thing fortifi
strengthen heart brain commonli affect
maladi mutual misaffect one anoth still
given everi day day insert purg like
physic occas serv forc mani time
help alon arnoldu hold aphor
prefer medicin kind soever

amongst number cordial alter find
present remedi cup wine strong drink soberli
opportun use It make man bold hardi courag whetteth
wit moder taken plutarch saith symp
quaest  make otherwis dull exhal
evapor like frankincens quicken xenophon add oil doth
fire A famou cordial matthiolu dioscoridum call
excel nutriment refresh bodi make good colour
flourish age help concoct fortifi stomach take away
obstruct provok urin drive excrement procur sleep clear
blood expel wind cold poison attenu concoct dissip
thick vapour fuligin humour and
purpos take away fear sorrow cura edac dissipat
evius It glad heart man psal civ hilaritati dulc
seminarium helena bowl sole nectar god true
nepenth homer put away care grief oribasiu
collect cap  other nought els cup good
wine It make mind king fatherless one
bond freeman poor rich turneth thought joy
mirth make rememb sorrow debt enricheth heart
make speak talent esdra It give life
spirit wit c for caus ancient call bacchu liber pater
liberando sacrif bacchu palla still upon
altar wine measur drunk time bring glad
cheer mind cheereth god men judg ix laetitia
bacchu dator make old wife danc miseri
forget evil merri

bacchu et afflicti requiem mortalibu affert
crura licet duro comped vincta forent

wine make troubl soul rest
though feet fetter opprest

subsect ii corrector expel wind against costiv c

speci hath great need correct
expel

expel wind simpl compound simpl herb root c

subsect ii how love tyranniseth men love heroic melancholi
definit part affected

you heard tyrant love rageth brute beast spirit
let us consid passion causeth amongst men improb
amor quid non mortalia pectora cogis how tickl heart mortal
men horresco referens almost afraid relat amaz
asham hath wrought stupend prodigi effect foul
offenc love inde may deni first unit provinc built
citi perpetu gener make preserv mankind
propag church rage love burn lust
diseas frenzi mad hell est orcu ill vi est
immedicabili est rabi insana t virtuou habit
vehement perturb mind monster natur wit art
alexi athenaeu set virilit audax muliebrit
timidium furor praecep labor infractum mel felleum blanda
percussio c It subvert kingdom overthrow citi town famili
mar corrupt make massacr men thunder lightn war
fire plagu done mischief mankind burn
lust brutish passion let sodom gomorrah troy dare
phrygiu dicti cretensi make good know mani
citi bear record et fuit ant helenam c succeed age
subscrib joanna napl itali fredegund brunhalt franc
histori full basilisk besid daili monomachi
murder effus blood rape riot immoder expens satisfi
lust beggari shame loss tortur punish disgrac loathsom
diseas proceed thenc wors calentur pestil
fever often gout pox arthriti palsi cramp sciatica
convuls ach combust c torment bodi feral
melancholi crucifi soul life everlastingli
torment world come

notwithstand know mani miseri threat tortur
sure come upon reward exhort e contra yet either
weak deprav natur love tyranni
furious rageth suffer led like ox
slaughter facili descensu averni go headlong
perdit commit folli beast men leav natur use
women paul saith burn lust one toward anoth
man man wrought filthi

semirami equo pasipha tauro aristo ephesiu asina se commiscuit
fulviu equa alii canibu capri c und monstra nascuntur aliquando
centauri sylvani et ad terrorem hominum prodigiosa spectra nec cum
bruti sed ipsi hominibu rem habent quod peccatum sodomia vulgo
dicitur et frequen olim vitium apud orientali illo fuit graeco
nimirum italo afro asiano hercul hylam habuit polycletum
dionem perithoonta abderum et phryga alii et euristium ab hercul amatum
tradunt socrat pulchrorum adolescentum causa frequen gymnasium adibat
flagitiosqu spectaculo pascebat oculo quod et philebu et phaedon
rival charmid et reliqui platoni dialog sati superqu
testatum faciunt quod vero alcibiad de eodem socrat loquatur luben
conticesco sed et abhorreo tantum incitamentum praebet libidini At hunc
perstrinxit theodoretu lib de curat graec affect cap ultimo quin
et ips plato suum demiratur agathonem xenophon cliniam virgiliu
alexin anacreon bathyllum quod autem de neron claudio caeterorumqu
portentosa libidin memoria proditum mallem petronio suetonio
caeterisqu petati quando omnem fidem excedat quam expecteti sed
vetera querimur apud asiano turca italo nunquam frequentiu
hoc quam hodierno die vitium diana romanorum sodomia officina horum
alicubi apud turca qui saxi semina mandant arena arant et
frequent querela etiam inter ipso conjug hac de quae virorum
concubitum illicitum calceo oppositam partem verso magistratui
indic nullum apud italo familiar magi peccatum qui et post
lucianum et tatium scripti voluminibi defendunt johann de
la casa beventinu episcopu divinum opu vocat suav scelu adeoqu
jactat se non alia usum vener nihil usitatiu apud monacho
cardinal sacrificulo etiam furor hic ad mortem ad insaniam
angelu politianu ob pueri amorem violenta sibi inanu injecit
Et horrendum sane dictu quantum apud no patrum memoria scelu
detestandum hoc saevierit quum enim anno prudentissimu rex
henricu octavu cucullatorum coenobia et sacrificorum collegia
votariorum per venerabil legum doctor thomam leum richardum laytonum
visitari fecerat c tanto numero reperti sunt apud eo scortator
cinaedi ganeon paedicon puerarii paederasta sodomita
balei verbi utor ganimed c ut unoquoqu eorum novam
credideri gomorrham sed vide si lubet eorundem catalogum apud eundem
balcum puella inquit lecti dormir non poter ob fratr
necromantico haec si apud votario monacho sancto scilicet
homuncion quid foro quid aula factum suspiceri quid apud
nobil quid inter fornic quam non foeditatem quam non spurcitiem
sileo interim turp illa et ne nominanda quidem monachorum
mastrupation masturbator rodericu castro vocat tum et eo
qui se invicem ad venerem excitandam flagri caedunt spintria succuba
ambubeia et lascivient lumbo tribad illa muliercula quae se invicem
fricant et praeter eunucho etiam ad venerem explendam artificiosa illa
veretra habent immo quod magi mirer faemina foeminam constantinopoli
non ita pridem deperiit ausa rem plane incredibilem mutato cultu mentita
virum de nuptii sermonem init et brevi nupta est sed authorem ipsum
consul busbequium omitto salanario illo egyptiaco qui cum
formosarum cadaveribu concumbunt et eorum vesanam libidinem qui etiam
idola et imagin depereunt nota est fabula pigmalioni apud
ovidium mundi et paulini apud aegesippum belli jud lib  cap
pontiu C caesari legatu referent plinio lib  cap  quem
suspicor eum ess qui christum crucifixit picturi atalanta et helena
adeo libidin incensu ut toller ea vellet si natura tectorii
permisisset aliu statuam bona fortuna deperiit aelianu lib  cap
aliu bona deae et ne qua par probro vacet raptu ad
stupra quod ait ill et ne os quidem libidin exceptum
heliogabalu per omnia cava corpori libidinem recepit lamprid vita
eju hostiu quidam specula fecit et ita disposuit ut quum virum
ips pateretur aversu omn admissarii motu speculo videret ac
deind falsa magnitudin ipsiu membri tanquam vera gauderet simul virum
et foeminam passu quod dictu foedum et abominandum Ut veram plane sit
quod apud plutarchum gryllu ulyssi objecit Ad hunc usqu diem apud
no nequ ma marem nequ foemina foeminam amavit qualia multa apud vo
memorabil et praeclari viri fecerunt ut vile misso faciam hercul
imberbem sectan socium amico deseruit c vestra libidin intra suo
natura fine coerceri non possunt quin instar fluvii exundanti atrocem
foeditatum tumultum confusionemqu natura gignant venerea nam et
capra porco equo inierunt viri et foemina insano bestiarum amor
exarserunt imd minotauri centauri sylvani sphing c sed ne
confutando doceam aut ea fora efferam quae non omn scire convenit
haec enim docti solummodo quod causa non absimili rodericu
scripta velim ne levissomi ingenti et depravati mentibu foedissimi
sceleri notitiam c nolo quem diutiu hisc sordibu inquinar

In eighth geniture exampl hath word

great temptat pierceth heart forma verecunda
nocuit mihi visa puellae much artifici entic

non tam grand

mount gargaru hath mani stem
As lover breast hath grievou wound
and link care love compound

when king babylon would punish courtier love
young ladi royal blood far fortun
apolloniu presenc mean persuad let alon for
love enjoy unspeak torment tyrant could invent
like punish gnat candl short space would

alitur et crescit malum

exundat antro

nam amor saep lypareo
vulcano ardentiorem flammam incender solet

vulcan flame smoke for fire saith xenophon
burn alon stand near touch fire love
burneth scorcheth afar hot vehement
materi fire igni ign furit t fire fire
quintess fire for nero burnt rome calisto urgeth fire
hous consum men bodi good fire devour soul
one soul worth hundr thousand bodi No water
quench wild fire

In pectu coeco absorbuit ign
ign qui nec aqua perimi potuer nec imbr
diminui nequ graminibu magicisqu susurri

A fire took breast
which water could quench
nor herb art magic spell
could quell drench

except tear sigh may chanc find littl eas

sic candentia colla sic paten fron

sic pare minio gena perurunt

totu tenu eam favilla

quit burnt forthwith cinder

est molli flamma medulla

and sli first secretli pass

but byandbi began rage burn amain

visceribu igni mersu et veni laten

and scorcheth entrail fire burn
A hous nimbl run along beam
and last whole overturn

the nearer unto ruin

Et priu aequoribu pisc et montibu umbra
Et volucr deerunt sylvi et murmura venti
quam mihi disced formosa amaryllidi ign

first sea shall want fish mountain shade
wood sing bird wind murmur shall fade
than fair amarylli love allay d

bid love bid deaf man hear blind man see dumb speak lame
run counsel good sick man relish physic eas
non prosunt domino quae prosunt omnibu artes As apollo confess
jupit could cure

omn humano curat medicina dolor
solu amor morbi non habet artificem

physic soon cure everi diseas
except love appeas

but whether love may cure mean shall explain
place meantim take cours otherwis
eas amend break outrag often prodigi
event amor et liber violenti dii sunt tatiu observ et
eousqu animum incendunt ut pudori oblivisci cogant love bacchu

forget honesti shame common civil for men ordinarili
thoroughli possess humour becom insensati et insani
amor insanus poet call besid
prove better beast irrat stupid
headstrong void fear god men frequent forswear
spend steal commit incest rape adulteri murder
depopul town citi countri satisfi lust

As never yet pagan jew turk

qui amor praecipitavit peju perit quam qui saxo salit
He run headlong top rock bad case
fall gulf love for henc saith
platina come repent dotag lose wit
make shipwreck fortun altogeth mad make away
other violent death prognosticatio est talis saith
gordoniu si non succurratur ii aut maniam cadunt aut
moriuntur prognost either run mad die for
passion continu saith aelian montaltu make
blood hot thick black inflamm get brain
continu medit wake dri mad
follow els make away O corydon corydon
quae te dementia cepit now arnoldu add speedili work
effect present help they pine away run
mad die upon sudden facil incidunt maniam saith valescu
quickli mad nisi succurratur good order taken

ehou trist jugum quisqui amori habet
Is priu se norit se periiss perit

Oh heavi yoke love whoso bear
Is quit undon unawar

So confess poet

insaniam priusquam qui sentiat
vix pili intervallo furor absum

shall mad perceiv
A hairbreadth scarc distract

As mad orlando angelica hercul hyla

At ill ruebat quo pede duceb furibundu
nam illi saevu deu intu jecur laniabat

He went car d whither mad
the cruel god tortur ala

At sight hero tell mani ran mad

aliu vulnu celan insanit pulchritudin puella

and whilst doth conceal grief
mad come like thief

Go bedlam exampl It well known everi villag mani
either die love voluntari made away need
much labour prove nec modu aut requi nisi mor
reperitur amoris death common catastroph person

mori mihi contingat non enim alia
liberatio ab aeramni fuerit ullo paeto isti

would dead nought god know
but death rid woe

As soon euryalu depart sene lucretia paramour never
look jest could exhilar sad mind joy comfort
wound distress soul littl fell sick die
but gentl end natur death person commonli make away

subsect iii bi counsel persuas foul fact men
women fault miseri marriag event lust c

which thing hath neither judgment end
how advic counsel amend

qui enim modu adsit amori but without question good counsel
advic must need great forc especi shall proceed
wise fatherli rever discreet person man author

alon abl divert suffic gordoniu physician
attribut much would mean use

If one
thou hadst much better alon

If barren c If children thi state
good though thou wari circumspect thi charg undo
thee foecunda domum tibi prole gravabit thou wilt abl

rule think old proverb greek haeiroon tekna paemata

much better childless T common middl
sort thi son drunkard gamest spendthrift thi daughter fool
whore thi servant lazi drone thiev thi neighbour devil
make thee weari thi life If thi wife froward
may thou hadst better buri aliv

die childb rich widow induc te laqueum thou dost

c dominam qui possit ferr tonantem hit thee still
teeth first husband young widow often insati

conjug dominam arcessis attend
list In take dowri thou losest thi liberti do intrat
liberta exit hazardest thine estat

hae sunt atqu alia multa magni dotibu
incommodit sumptusqu intolerabil c

mani inconveni say best command servant
thou hadst better taken good housewif maid smock sinc
hazard thou wise keep thyself thou art t good
match much better free

procrear libero lepidissimum
hercl vero liberum ess id multo est lepidiu

art thou young match yet old match

vi juveni nuber nondum venit tempu
ingravescent aetat jam tempu praeteriit

and therefor philosoph still make answer thi friend
importun thee marri adhuc intempestivum t yet unseason
ever

consid withal free happi secur heavenli respect
singl man said comedi et isti quod fortunatum
ess autum uxorem nunquam habui neighbour
admir applaud account great happi never

Of passion alreadi prove love violent
bitter potion lovemelancholi afford bastard
jealousi greatest appear prodigi symptom
hath produceth for besid fear sorrow common
melancholi anxieti mind suspicion aggrav restless
thought pale meagr neglect busi like
men farther yet misaffect higher strain T
vehement passion furiou perturb bitter pain fire
pernici curios gall corrupt honey life mad
vertigo plagu hell ordinarili disquiet lose
bonum pacis chrysostom observ though rich keep
sumptuou tabl nobli alli yet miserrimi omnium sunt
miser ordinarili discont sad nihil
tristius ordinarili suspici jealousi saith vive
beget unquiet mind night day hunt everi word
hear everi whisper amplifi melancholi
men matter unjust calumni other
misinterpret everyth said done apt mistak
misconstru pri everi corner follow close observ
hair T proper jealousi

pale hag infern furi pleasur smart
envi observ pri everi part

subsect vi cure despair physic good counsel comfort c

experi teacheth us though mani die obstin wil
maladi yet multitud abl resist overcom seek help
find comfort taken e faucibu erebi chop hell
devil paw though oblig given
some strength god assist
though He kill saith job yet trust him good
counsel advic physic bellovacu cure monk alter
habit cours life plater mani physic alon but
part must concur take wrong cours think overcom
feral passion sole physic much think
work effect good servic alon though forcibl
yet vi unita fortior must go hand hand
diseas alteriu sic altera poscit opem for physic like cours
taken melancholi diet air exercis
passion perturb mind c rectifi
mean they must left solitari never
idl never compani counsel good comfort appli
shall see parti inclin caus whether loss fear
grief discont feral accid guilti conscienc
otherwis frequent medit grievou apprehens
consider former life hear read scriptur good
divin good advic confer appli god word
distress soul must correct counterpois mani excel
exhort phraenet discours extant purpos
way troubl mind perkin greenham hayward bright
abernethi bolton culmannu helmingiu caeliu secundu nichola
laurentiu copiou subject azoriu navarru sayru c
written case conscienc amongst pontif
writer but men work parti hand
parabl time benefit eas
afflict request friend recollect
volumin treatis comfort speech exhort
argument advic tend subject god word know
culmannu saith upon like occas unavail vain
men council comfort afflict conscienc except god word
concur annex come life eas repent c
presuppos first beza greenham perkin bolton give
charg parti counsel given suffici prepar
humbl sin fit comfort confess tri

hor lib sat

secundum moenia locu erat frondosi populi opacu vitibusqu spont
nati tenui prope aqua defluebat placid murmuran ubi sedil et
domu democr conspiciebatur

ips composit considebat super genua volumen haben et utrinqu alia

rimabatur

et symbol moon symbol scorpio

Ex atra bile varii generantur morbi perind ut ips multum calidi aut
frigidi se habuerit quum utriqu suscipiendo quam aptissima sit
tametsi suapt natura frigida sit annon aqua sic afficitur calor
ut ardeat et frigor ut glaciem concrescat et haec varieta
distinctionum alii flent rident c

hanc ad intemperantiam gignendam plurimum confert symbol mar et
symbol saturn positu c

symbol mercuri quoti alicuju genitura symbol scorpio et
symbol pisc adverso signo positu horoscopum partilit
tenueret atqu etiam symbol mar vel symbol saturn symbol
quadratur radio percussu fuerit natu ab insania vexabitur

qui symbol saturn et symbol mar habet alterum culmin
alterum imo coelo cum lucem venerit melancholicu erit qua
sanebitur si symbol mercuri illo irradiarit

hac configuration natu aut lunaticu aut ment captu

melancholicorum symptoma siderum influenti

crato consil Ut immodica corpori exercitatio nocet corporibu
ita vita dese et otiosa otium anim pituitosum reddit viscerum
obstruction et crebra fluxion et morbo concitat

Et vide quod una de rebu quae magi generat melancholiam est
otiosita

reponitur otium ab alii causa et hoc nobi observatum eo huic
malo magi obnoxio qui plane otiosi sunt quam eo qui aliquo muner
versantur exequendo

De tranquil anima sunt qua ipsum otium animi conjicit
aegritudinem

nihil est quod aequ melancholiam alat ac augeat ac otium et
abstinentia corpori et animi exercitationibu

nihil magi excaecat intellectum quam otium gordoniu de observat

suo admover carnific cogitationibu et sensibu sui adhiber

necessit utimur

quo semel est imbuta recen servabit odorem testa diu hor

natura semini sic quoqu lacti proprieta nequ id hominibu
solum sed pecudibu animadversum nam si ovium lact hoedi aut
caprarum agni alerentur constat fieri lanam duriorem
illi capillum gigni severiorem

contrahit

lacti tenet

lib  c educatio altera natura alterat animo et voluntatem
atqu utinam inquit liberorum nostrorum more non ipsi perderemu
quum infantiam statim delicii solvimu mollior ista educatio quam
indulgentiam vocamu nervo omn et menti et corpori frangit
fit ex consuetudo ind natura

sapient

hor vide ant

humor pravi mentum obnubil

hic humor vel parti intemperi generatur vel relinquitur post
inflammation vel crassior veni conclusu vel torpidu malignam
qualitatem contrabit

saep constat febr hominem melancholicum vel post febrem reddi
aut alium morbum calida intemperi innata vel febr contracta

raro qui diuturno morbo laborat qui non sit melancholicu
mercuriali de affect capiti lib c de melanc

Ad nonum lib rhasi ad almansor c universalit quacunqu
part potest fieri melancholicu vel quia aduritur vel quia non
expellit superfluitatem excrementi

A lien juvidor utero et alii partibu oritur

materia melancholia aliquando cord stomacho hepat ab
hypocondrii myruch splene cum ibi romanet humor melancholicu

Ex sanguin adusto intra vel extra caput

qui calidum cor habent cerebrum humidum facil melancholici

sequitur melancholia malam intemperiem frigidam et siccam ipsiu
cerebri

saep fit ex calidior cerebro aut corpor colligent melancholiam
piso

vel per propriam affectionem vel per consensum cum vapor exhal
cerebrum montalt cap

aut ibi gignitur melancholicu fumu aut aliund vehitur alterando
animal facult
